cross_references.name: All Other Miscellaneous Textile Product Mills

description.value: This U.S. industry comprises establishments primarily engaged in manufacturing textile products (except carpets and rugs; curtains and linens; textile bags and canvas products; rope, cordage, and twine; and tire cords and tire fabrics) from purchased materials.

job_tasks.value: High risk job tasks associated with this industry: Repeatedly inhale dust of esparto grass Repeatedly prepare, card, or spin natural vegetable fibers
